title: Somebody help me with my jee score updation
content: I filled my application form on 22nd May and was unable to upload my jee score since the portal was closed for generation of rank list. Now I got an email saying those who haven't yet uploaded their jee scores can upload on 24th May. But the portal shows that the time window has ended. Please help

comments.body:
Same 
Also they said that they will reopen thr portal on 24th May but they haven't reopened
Go use Firefox I got572 rank can I get cse or ai ml
No pes if I got That in jee i won't join pes

Bro according to pessat rank was 1600

I'm here getting 15XX thinking I'll get ai

Will they give a new ranking on 28th or what is the procedure 

Yesterday the portal was open apparently but they did an error with my rank I don't know what to do here
They still havent opened the window
Seats are almost 1k if we add up cse and ai ml too from both campsp??
